#include <iostream>

using namespace std;
unsigned long long f[100001];
int ntest,n;

int main(){       
    f[0]=f[1]=f[2]=f[3]=0;
    for(int i=4; i<100001; i++){        
        f[i] = f[i-1]+ (1LL*(i-1)*(i-2)/2-(i-1)/2)/2;
    }
    scanf("%d",&ntest);
    while(ntest--){
        scanf("%d",&n);
        cout <<f[n] << endl;
    }
    return 0;
    
}
